comment: Existence of a class abstraction of existentially restricted sets. Variables ` x ` and ` y ` are normally free-variable parameters in the class expression substituted for ` C ` , which can be thought of as ` C ( x , y ) ` . See comments for ~ abrexex . (Contributed by NM, 20-Sep-2011.)
